author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Sports (Football) - Shoot 'n' Score (Zidane Edition) Review
review:
This is one of the smallest LEGO Sports (Football) sets I have and it's a nice little set to have as well. We get a catapult which shoots the balls and we also got the big clear goal. You can also put this set in this goal and there's also a part which allows you to take this set to your friends for example. The built is fun and easy and the pieces are also nice for future brickfilms and/or MOC's (My own creations) for sure.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
